#summary a glossary of Orchestra terms.

= Glossary =

This is glossary of terms we use in Orchestra.

= Details =

*_Epoch Number_* global counter, similiar to a subversion revision number

*_Labelled Null_* different form SQL null - we can join on labelled nulls. _1_ indicates there is no labeled null. All other values than _1_.

*_Reconcile Number_* another name for _Epoch Number_

*_State Store_* 

*_Update Store_*
